Description: Bright and sunny 2 bedroom with Garage Parking at a newer Elevator building in a convenient Jamaica Plain location! This corner home features nice views, large windows, central AC, hardwood floors throughout, and open kitchen/living space. The building was constructed from ground up in 2007 and features extra storage, bike racks, assigned garage parking and common laundry. This condo is facing a quite back street, so you'll be able to escape from the city hustle and bustle while having the convenience of being very close to a Whole Foods and a Stop&Shop, neighborhood restaurants and coffee shops, and a train station.
